apollo

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • apollo.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    To get a Connection, call getConnection(). When done, call recycle(). This reuses the connections. Usually, you should not call close().

      • exec

        public int exec(java.lang.String sql)
         throws SQLiteException
        Used for all sql commands except for SELECT, including DDL statements, inserts, updates and deletes. Returns the number of rows affected. This must be called within a transaction.
        Throws:
        SQLiteException
